      Location HighlightPanel.getDropLoc()

      Methods in pente that return types with arguments of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Location> PenteLogic.capture(int row, int col, int playerID)
      Given a playerID piece played at (row, col), this method returns an ArrayList of Locations where opponent pieces will be captured, if any.
      java.util.ArrayList<Location> PenteLogic.fiveInARow(int row, int col, int playerID)
      Given a playerID piece played at (row, col), this method returns an ArrayList of Locations where the player will win with 5-or-more-in-a-row, column, or diagonal, if any.
